index.title: Tutorial: Tour of Heroes
index.intro: The Tour of Heroes tutorial takes you through the steps of creating an Angular application in TypeScript.

toh-pt2.title: Master/Detail
toh-pt2.intro: Build a master/detail page with a list of heroes.

toh-pt3.title: Multiple Components
toh-pt3.intro: Refactor the master/detail view into separate components.

toh-pt4.title: Services
toh-pt4.intro: Create a reusable service to manage the hero data calls.

toh-pt5.title: Routing
toh-pt5.intro: Add the Angular component router and learn to navigate among the views.

toh-pt6.title: HTTP
toh-pt6.subtitle: Getting and saving data
toh-pt6.intro: Convert the service and components to use Angular's HTTP service.
